mapper.insert: insert into item (idx, category, itemname, itemprice, hit, sellCVS, averscore, eventType) values (item_idx_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{hit}, #{sellCVS}, #{averscore}, #{eventType})
mapper.select: select * from item order by idx desc
mapper.update: update item set hit = hit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update item set itemname = #{itemName}, itemprice = #{itemPrice}, itemimage = #{itemImage}, category = #{category}, sellCVS = #{sellCVS}, eventType = #{eventType} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from item where rownum <= 5 order by hit desc, idx desc
select * from item where itemname like '%' || #{itemName} || '%' order by idx desc
